name: Palace Of The Golden Horses, Malaysia
description: Hotel Katson Blue is new built up hotel which is located in Simsa Ghadherni Village Manali.Hotel has 24 well furnished rooms which have all modern amenities in the rooms (Hair Dryer,Tea Coffee maker,Kingsize Bed,Study table) and 50 cover multi cuisine restaurant,Big Lobby Area ,Modern Lift ,Power Backup,Small Garden Area and ample parking Area. Hotel is just 3KM before Manali mall road main Market and 2 KM from before Volvo Bus stand Hotel has 11 River view rooms and 14 valley view rooms which give immense satisfaction to in house gues
